trans-unit.source: Configures a service credential.
trans-unit.target: 設定服務認證。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to specify the credential for the service such as an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別來指定服務，例如 X.509 憑證的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Also, use this class to specify the authentication model for various client credentials such as user name and password validation.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用此類別來指定各種用戶端認證，例如使用者名稱和密碼驗證的驗證模型。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as a parameter in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.BuildChannelListenerCore%2A> method, by methods of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, and is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為參數<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.BuildChannelListenerCore%2A>方法的方法， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>，並傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.BuildChannelListenerCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref>從指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref> instance used to initialize the new instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"> </xref>用來初始化新執行個體的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current client certificate authentication and provisioning settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的用戶端憑證驗證與佈建此服務的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a client certificate authentication model using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Authentication%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定用戶端憑證驗證模型使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Authentication%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Authentication%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the mutual certificate duplex scenario, you can specify an X.509 certificate to use in a response or callback using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateInitiatorClientCredential.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在相互憑證雙工案例中，您可以指定要用於回應或回呼使用 X.509 憑證<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateInitiatorClientCredential.Certificate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateInitiatorClientCredential.Certificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateInitiatorServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateInitiatorServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Copies the essential members of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 複製目前的執行個體的基本成員。

trans-unit.source: The CloneCore method calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: CloneCore 方法呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a token manager for this service.
trans-unit.target: 建立此服務的權杖管理員。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception mapper associated with the service credentials.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務認證相關聯的例外狀況對應工具。

trans-unit.source: The exception mapper associated with the service credentials.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況對應工具與服務認證相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity configuration for the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務的身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: The identity configuration for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current issued token (for example, SAML) authentication settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前發行的權杖 （例如，SAML） 驗證設定此服務。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IssuedTokenServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IssuedTokenServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current credential authentication and provisioning settings to be used by peer transport endpoints configured on the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的認證驗證與佈建服務上所設定之對等傳輸端點所使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.PeerCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.PeerCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current settings to be used by a secure conversation.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全對話要使用的目前設定。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to specify a list of known claim types for the Security Context Token (SCT) cookies serialization and an encoder to encode and secure cookies information.
trans-unit.target: 使用此類別來指定的安全性內容權杖 (SCT) cookie 序列化及編碼及確保 cookie 資訊安全的編碼器的已知的宣告型別清單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current certificate associated with this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此服務相關聯的目前憑證。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds this instance to a binding parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體加入至繫結參數集合。

trans-unit.source: This is an infrastructure method and not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎結構方法，不能直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Some binding elements can sometimes access extra information when building factories.
trans-unit.target: 建置處理站時，某些繫結項目有時可以存取的額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class is a collection of objects that contain this extra information.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是包含此額外資訊的物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host base.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機基底。

trans-unit.source: A collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數的集合。

trans-unit.source: parameters is .
trans-unit.target: parametersis .

trans-unit.source: Apply the dispatch behavior.
trans-unit.target: 套用分派行為。

trans-unit.source: This is an infrastructure method and not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎結構方法，不能直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host base.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機基底。

trans-unit.source: Validates a service description.
trans-unit.target: 驗證服務描述。

trans-unit.source: This is an infrastructure method and not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎結構方法，不能直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host base.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機基底。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the service credential uses identity configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務認證使用身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the service credential uses identity configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果服務認證使用身分識別組態。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current user name/password authentication settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的使用者名稱/密碼驗證設定，此服務。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the settings of the user name/password authentication by calling members of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential> class on this instance, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定透過呼叫的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential>這個執行個體上，例如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>類別</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential>成員的使用者名稱/密碼驗證設定

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current Windows authentication settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: 取得此服務的目前 Windows 驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to specify whether to allow anonymous Windows users access by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別來指定是否允許匿名 Windows 使用者存取，藉由設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, use this class to specify whether to include a group information to which users belong in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用這個類別來指定是否要包含在使用者所屬的群組資訊<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>藉由設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential"> </xref>執行個體。
